name: MovieSuggestion
0:
caret
”Alexa open movie suggestion”
”Recommend a movie in the action genre”
”I'm looking for something different”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie suggestion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Discover your next movie night with Movie Suggestion, the amazing Alexa skill designed with advanced algorithms to help you find the perfect suggestions for movies based on your preferences. 
Whether you are movie passionate or you are just looking for a film to set up your mood, Movie Suggestion is your best choice to live a whole entertainment experience.
Movie Suggestion offers you a large choice of movies by categories and release time, all you need to say is :
"Alexa open Movie Suggestion"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
